briefdescription.para: Creates a new BGroupView and targets it.

detaileddescription.para: Methods called on this builder will be directed to the new BGroupView's BGroupLayout.

parameterdescription.para: The orientation for the new BGroupView.
The spacing for the new BGroupView.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new BGroupLayout, and attaches it to a BWindow.

simplesect.para: The top BView* in window has its ViewColor set to B_PANEL_BACKGROUND_COLOR.

parameterdescription.para: The BWindow* to attach the newly created BGroupLayout to.
The orientation for the new BGroupLayout.
The spacing for the new BGroupLayout.

briefdescription.para: Creates a builder targeting an existing view.

parameterdescription.para: The BView* to attach the newly created BGroupLayout to.
The orientation for the new BGroupLayout.
The spacing for the new BGroupLayout.

briefdescription.para: Creates a builder targeting a BGroupLayout.

detaileddescription.para: Methods called on this builder will be directed to layout.

parameterdescription.para: The BGroupLayout to target with this builder.

briefdescription.para: Creates a builder targeting a BGroupView.

detaileddescription.para: Methods called on this builder will be directed to view->GroupLayout().

parameterdescription.para: The BGroupView this builder will target.

briefdescription.para: Get a pointer to the layout this builder represents.
Get a pointer to the BView this builder's layout is attached to.
Get the layout this builder represents.

parameterdescription.para: The layout this builder represents.

briefdescription.para: Get a pointer to the BView this builder's layout is attached to.

parameterdescription.para: The BView this builder's layout is attached to.

briefdescription.para: Cast this builder into the layout object it represents.
Add a BView to the BGroupLayout this builder represents.

parameterdescription.para: The BView to be added.

briefdescription.para: Add BView to the BGroupLayout this builder represents.

parameterdescription.para: The BView to be added.
The weight to give view.

briefdescription.para: Add a BLayoutItem to the BGroupLayout this builder represents.

parameterdescription.para: The BLayoutItem to be added.

briefdescription.para: Add a BLayoutItem the BGroupLayout this builder represents.

parameterdescription.para: The BLayoutItem to be added.
The weight to give item.

sectiondef.header: Adding BLayouts and their BView Pairs

description.para: A set of methods that add a BLayout or BView subclass and return a BLayoutBuilder::Base subclass representing the newly added object. These methods push a new builder on top of the stack, you will not be using this builder again until you call End().

briefdescription.para: Add a new viewless BGroupLayout as a child to the layout that this builder represents and return a GroupBuilder representing the new layout.

parameterdescription.para: The orientation to use for the new BGroupLayout.
The spacing to use for the new BGroupLayout.
The weight for the new BGroupLayout in this group layout.

simplesect.para: A GroupBuilder representing the newly created BGroupLayout.

briefdescription.para: Add an existing BGroupView as a child to the layout that this builder represents and return a GroupBuilder representing the layout of the added groupView.

parameterdescription.para: The BGroupView to be added.
The weight for groupView in this group layout.

simplesect.para: A GroupBuilder representing the layout of the groupView.

briefdescription.para: Add an existing BGroupLayout as a child to the layout that this builder represents and return a GroupBuilder to the added layout.

parameterdescription.para: The BGroupLayout to be added.
The weight for groupLayout in this group layout.

briefdescription.para: Add a new viewless BGridLayout as a child to the layout that this builder represents and return a GridBuilder representing the new layout.

parameterdescription.para: The horizontal spacing for the new BGridLayout.
The vertical spacing for the new BGridLayout.
The weight for the new BGroupLayout in the BGroupLayout this builder represents.

simplesect.para: A GridBuilder representing the newly created BGridLayout.

briefdescription.para: Add an existing BGridLayout as a child to the layout that this builder represents and return a GridBuilder to the added layout.

parameterdescription.para: The BGridLayout to be added.
The weight for gridLayout in the BGroupLayout this builder represents.

briefdescription.para: Add an existing BGridView as a child to the layout this builder represents and return a GridBuilder representing the layout of the added gridView.

parameterdescription.para: The BGridView to be added.
The weight for gridView in this BGroupLayout.

simplesect.para: A GridBuilder representing the layout of the gridView.

briefdescription.para: Add a new BSplitView as a child to the layout that this builder represents and return a SplitBuilder representing the new BSplitView.

parameterdescription.para: The orientation of the new BSplitView.
The spacing of the new BSplitView.
The weight, in this BGroupLayout for the new BSplitView.

simplesect.para: A SplitBuilder representing the new BSplitView.

briefdescription.para: Add an existing BSplitView as a child to the layout this builder represents and return a SplitBuilder representing the layout of the added splitView.

parameterdescription.para: The BSplitView to be added.
The weight of the BSplitView in the BGroupLayout this builder represents.

briefdescription.para: Add a new viewless BCardLayout as a child to the layout that this builder represents and return a CardBuilder representing the new layout.

parameterdescription.para: The weight of this new layout within the current group layout.

simplesect.para: A CardBuilder representing the new BCardLayout.

briefdescription.para: Add an existing BCardLayout as a child to the layout that this builder represents and return a CardBuilder representing the added layout.

parameterdescription.para: The existing layout to add to the current group layout.
The weight of this new layout within the current group layout.

briefdescription.para: Add an existing BCardView as a child to the layout that this builder represents and return a CardBuilder representing the layout of the added BCardView.

parameterdescription.para: The existing BCardView to add to the current group layout.
The weight of this new layout within the current group layout.

simplesect.para: A CardBuilder representing the layout of the cardView.

description.para: Some convenience methods for adding special BSpaceLayoutItems.

briefdescription.para: Add a BSpaceLayoutItem created by BSpaceLayoutItem::CreateGlue() to the builder's layout.

parameterdescription.para: The weight of the BSpaceLayoutItem in the BGroupLayout this builder represents

briefdescription.para: Add a BSpaceLayoutItem created by BSpaceLayoutItem::CreateHorizontalStrut() or BSpaceLayoutItem::CreateVerticalStrut() to the BGroupLayout this builder represents.

parameterdescription.para: The width or height of the strut to be created (depending on the orientation of the BGroupLayout this builder represents).

memberdef.argsstring: (float left, float top, float right, float bottom)
memberdef.name: SetInsets

detaileddescription.para: Set the insets for this layout.

Set the spacing around the edges of this layout. If you pass B_USE_DEFAULT_SPACING for a certain parameter, that parameter will be replaced with the value returned by BControlLook::DefaultItemSpacing().
Set the insets for this layout.
This is a convenience method to easily set similar insets.

parameterdescription.para: The insets to the left and right of the layout.
The insets at the top and bottom of the layout.

detaileddescription.para: Set the insets for this layout.
This is a convenience method that to easily set all the insets of the layout to the same value.

parameterdescription.para: The inset to be applied to left, top, right and bottom of this layout.

briefdescription.para: Set the explicit minimum size of the underlying layout.
Set the explicit maximum size of the underlying layout.
Set the explicit preferred size of the underlying layout.
Set the explicit alignment of the underlying layout.
Shorthand for builders returned by this builder's AddCards() methods.
Shorthand for builders returned by this builder's AddGrid() methods.
Shorthand for builders returned by this builder's AddGroup() methods.
Shorthand for builders returned by this builder's AddSplit() methods.
Shorthand representing the type of this.
BLayoutBuilder::Base subclass for building BGroupLayouts.
